A first test of a post

August 24, 2024

This is a test ! This is a test ! This is a test ! This is a test !

\[\begin{align} KL(p,q) &= \mathbb{E}_p \log \frac{p(x)}{q(x)}\\ &\qquad = D_{f_{-\!\!\log t}}(q,p) \\ &= \mathbb{E}_q \frac{p(x)}{q(x)} \log \frac{p(x)}{q(x)}\\ &\qquad = D_{f_{t\!\log t}}(p,q) \end{align}\]
